about_the_game:
Struggling is a physics-based co-op platformer with a twisted spin on teamwork. Control the arms of a squishy abomination and guide it through a deranged world where anything goes.

Outrun ravenous rats, joyride a dirt bike, and vault over pools of unmentionable waste. One thing’s certain: you will struggle.

Get into the Struggling groove with this eclectic collection of genre-mashing bops. Expect the unexpected! But also expect ‘80s synth-pop, chill-out ambience, electro-rock, and operatic gibberish.
detailed_description:
Struggling is a physics-based co-op platformer with a twisted spin on teamwork. Control the arms of a squishy abomination and guide it through a deranged world where anything goes.

Outrun ravenous rats, joyride a dirt bike, and vault over pools of unmentionable waste. One thing’s certain: you will struggle.

Get into the Struggling groove with this eclectic collection of genre-mashing bops. Expect the unexpected! But also expect ‘80s synth-pop, chill-out ambience, electro-rock, and operatic gibberish.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Storage: 139 MB available space
  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 2 GB available space
